markdown:
# Help us help you

Can you help us improve our website for you and other people looking for
health information?

Necessary cookies
Always enabled

Necessary cookies enable core functions such as security, network
management, and accessibility.

Analytics cookies

This would mean allowing us to set analytics cookies. These collect
and report anonymous information on how you use the website. We
would use Google Analytics and Hotjar to gather this information.

[Read our privacy policy](https://www.phin.org.uk/about/our-privacy-policy)

Accept all cookies

Reject analytics cookies

# The Private Healthcare Information Network (PHIN)

Giving you confidence in your choices

A trusted source for patients on consultants and hospitals providing private
healthcare

Search for consultants and hospitals in your area

![Hero](https://www.phin.org.uk/images/homepage/hero-left.svg)

Search for consultants and hospitals in your area

LocationName

![Search](https://www.phin.org.uk/images/search/search-icon.svg)

![Hero](https://www.phin.org.uk/images/homepage/hero-right.svg)

Search![Hero](https://www.phin.org.uk/images/homepage/hero-mobile.svg)

PHIN is a government-mandated, industry-certified, independent organisation
which publishes information about the safety, quality and costs of private
healthcare. Each month, we help over 40,000 people make more educated
decisions about their day-case / inpatient procedures.

[Impartial and based on data](https://www.phin.org.uk/about/welcome-to-the-phin-website) [Not-for-profit and free](https://www.phin.org.uk/about/how-are-phin-funded) [Government mandated](https://www.phin.org.uk/about/our-mandate-and-governance-) [Informative and explanatory](https://www.phin.org.uk/about/how-the-phin-website-can-help-you-)

[New to private healthcare? Check out our explainer and videos](https://www.phin.org.uk/about/help-with-healthcare-and-how-to-use-this-site-videos)
